name: AVCaptionRenderer
desc: An object that renders captions for display at a particular time.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: The drawing bounds of caption scenes.

items.name: func captionSceneChanges(in: CMTimeRange) -> [AVCaptionRenderer.Scene]
items.desc: Determine render time ranges within an enclosing time range to account for visual changes among captions.

items.name: class AVCaptionRenderer.Scene
items.desc: An object that holds a time range and an associated state which indicates when the renderer draws output.

items.name: func render(in: CGContext, for: CMTime)
items.desc: Draw the captions for the time you specify.
